alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 1:59PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations around one tenth of an inch and ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as near zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Louisiana and central, east central, northeast, south central, southwest and west central Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel is expected and dangerously low wind chills are expected. There may be a few power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com.
